com.simsilica.lemur.event

Interface MouseListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Button.ButtonMouseHandler, ConsumingMouseListener, DefaultMouseListener, FocusMouseListener, HoverMouseListener, StyleDebugMouseListener

    public interface MouseListener
    Implementations of this interface can be registered with the MouseEventControl to receive mouse events for a Spatial.
